title: Create a reservation group
description: Create a reservation group in a specific project and location. A reservation group is a container for BigQuery reservations.

objective.narrative: This sample solves the problem of programmatically creating containers for BigQuery reservations. A developer might need to do this as part of an automated onboarding process for a new team or project, ensuring they have a dedicated structure for their BigQuery resource allocations.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_reservationgroup_create
